title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 7 ยง 1927.2 - Motor vehicle use
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 7 ยง 1927.2 - Motor vehicle use

State Regulations

The provisions of sections
1902.1
and
1903.2
of this Title relating to the licensure and ownership of motor vehicles for
inmates participating in continuous temporary release shall apply to inmates
participating in a day reporting program. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 7
ยง
1927.2

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
